title: skin problems for my star guardian lux
body: I had this skin for so long , a friend gifted me the skin and then when I got back on like weeks later I cant use the skin for some reason. even in the gifting history says that I got gifted my star guardian lux skin . and when I go into champion select the skin says I need to buy it....  can anyone help me?

replies.body: We'd like to look into this with you individually, and offer more context!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can fill in the details.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
